descriptionHtml:
[size=6][center][color=#ff0000][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48629]Updated patch here[/url]
[/color]\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\[/center][/size]Patch to fix conflicts Skyrim Redone 1.3.01 with USKP, UDGP, UDBP and sometimes I'll add other corrections :)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38177]Spanish version[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39031]Polish version[/url]
